Hello Everyone!
 I am an undergraduate Computer Science student,currently in my third year.
 I Have an experience in Data Structures, Algorithms, and Database.
 I am currently learning web development,

 Interested in UX UI to make people life easier and give the best experience possible.
 Fast learner, a good leader, and great at teamwork.
 I have a lot of hobbies and interested in gaming.
